thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Double-Homicide Sends Shockwaves Through Changing Brooklyn Neighborhood

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Double-Homicide Sends Shockwaves Through Changing Brooklyn Neighborhood
text:
Even when the Brooklyn neighborhood of Prospect Lefferts Gardens was known as Flatbush years ago and the city was in the midst of a crime wave, Marie Reid didn’t feel the need to look behind her back while walking to her home.
The 72-year-old Ms. Reid did just that on Thursday when she passed a taped-off crime scene on the 200th block of Winthrop Street, just two blocks from Prospect Park, one of the borough’s crown jewels. A day earlier, at about 6:40 p.m., a married couple was walking on the quiet, residential street outside...
